# Protofolio

> Free, responsive portfolio templates prototyped for you.

Protofolio is a collection of free portfolio website templates built by Siddharth Mahajan (siddharthmhjn.com). Each template is fully responsive, fast-loading, and ready to use.

## Available Templates

- Clean Minimalist: Simple, elegant, professional portfolio with light mode and fast performance.
- Bento: Modern grid-based bento layout, responsive and minimal.
- Retro Gaming: Pixel art inspired, nostalgic dark mode template with animations and interactivity.
- Illustrative UI: Creative and artistic portfolio with colorful illustrations.
- Modern SaaS: Corporate, sleek, and polished professional template.
- Digital Nebula: Futuristic dark mode template with neon effects and animations.

## Key Features

- All templates are 100% responsive
- Free to browse and use
- 6+ templates available
- 24/7 support

## Contact

Website: https://siddharthmhjn.com
Portfolio site: https://protofolio.siddharthmhjn.com
